      locate the drums

      i am made of math

      arctica

6.26.21  1:37 pm   i've been writing songs for years and i'm still not writing songs that i like. like AT ALL. LIKE I HATE THEM. WHAT TO DO??!?!!

      write that down and then react to it in 12 hours

      because the one i am currently doing is not done yet

6.26.21  12:06 pm   what is stopping you from uploading your next song?

      the song not being done

      have you tried saving the universe

     because airport terminals are a staple element of the human earth planet on which we reside

     its a weird yet good song

6.26.21  9:50 am   what do you think is the upper time limit for a bill wurtz song.

     usually something like 3:40

     do you think a 10 minute song just hasnt happened by chance or is there an underlying characteristic to your songs that cause them to always be complete before then?

      i'm not sure

6.26.21  9:42 am   What's your favourite hobby?

      doing everything forever until i finish all of it

6.26.21  8:03 am   when you wrote 'do not attempt' during the 'buckets                                   catch the dreams as they fall from my ceiling' line were advising against writing down dreams?

      no, i probably meant something more along the lines of: don't try to create a 3-minute 3D video from scratch, by yourself

6.26.21  5:48 am   are bad things bad?

      let me perform some calculations

6.26.21  12:34 am   Have you heard of "Music"?

      no way

6.25.21  11:06 pm   in the grand scheme of things, do we really matter?

     yes. if things don't matter then that's not a very grand scheme is it

     will we make an impact on anything that happens?

     yes

      is life meaningless?

     no

     if life has a meaning, what is it?

     everything, anything, no limit on meaning. can go as high or low as you desire. even slantwards, if you can handle it

     does anything really matter?

     yes

     is life random,

     there are random elements, which provide ample work/play space for the non-random elements to thrive

     or does everything happen for a reason?

     the amount of reason does not have to be a whole number (0,1,2,3,4 etc), it can be a floating point value (2.173656, 598.06261). Also, the exact reasonal solution can never be fully known all at one time, thanks to the heisenberg uncertainty principle

6.25.21  10:39 pm   When I'm in a place such as work and I'm thinking about all the things I want to do, I'll get really excited and my mind will go almost hyperactive but when I sit down to actually do the thing I've usually exhausted myself from all of the thinking I've done and it's very frustrating. Should I try to think about other things when I'm not able to access a keyboard or notebook?

      what i think you should do is find a simple relaxing activity to do, in your workspace, to calm your mind down and get back to your normal self

6.25.21  10:13 pm   Cm, Ddim, G7, C7. where next

      to the melody/lyric, in that same part. that will help you determine what comes in the next part

6.25.21  9:30 pm   how do i know that my friends dont secretly hate me 

      you could tap their phone

6.25.21  9:07 pm   any tips on getting my vocal track to sound better?

      you might have to say what you are actually feeling

6.25.21  8:37 pm   Why are pop songs so repetitive and simplistic with simplistic chords and drum beats made with computers?

      why is the word simplistic so complicated

6.25.21  7:14 pm   In https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=202105270746, you say that you like improvising song lyrics, but in https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=202106241910, you say that you prefer scripting your written videos, like hi im steve. Is there a reason you like to imrpovise music and script written pieces?

     i thought written and scripted mean the same thing. but, then again, improvisation just means you wrote it faster, i suppose. That being said, 99% of the songs and videos i release have scripted vocals. i also love improvising lyrics/vocals, but due to various circumstances i haven't done it in a long time

     Have you tried improvising written works, and what were the benefits and disadvantages?

     i suppose you'd have to do it at exactly the right speed so it could be fast enough to technically be considered improv and yet slow enough to considered written. maybe thinking of an average of 1 word every 2 seconds?

6.25.21  6:16 pm   Do you believe that free will exists,

     yes

     or our universe is deterministic and all the situations of the particles are already defined?

     no

     Why?

      a pre-determined world would be none of our business. we wouldn't even be there to see it

      north tijuana

6.25.21  5:20 pm   What is your favorite quote of all times?

      hello

6.25.21  5:16 pm   Is the airport terminal in "at the airport terminal" a metaphor for life itself

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

      you could try an instrument

      how round the world is

      impossible. it can't be done

      hopefully to provide something you can really wrap your head around

6.25.21  5:09 am   Will the next song drop SOON?

      of course

      infinte. Wait ............................ what the heck is a typical 4 chord song

      regular ones

6.25.21  1:02 am   what are your songs about?

      the world

6.24.21  10:53 pm   You mentioned that you didn't like how 'and the day goes on' turned out,

     i don't think i said that. it's not quite true

      so will you ever rewrite and make it how you intended it to be?

      there's many other things i have yet to make for the first time, so i should take care of those first, then maybe circle back for the re-makes

6.24.21  10:24 pm   Is there any case in any of your songs where the question "Is [thing] from [song] related to [other thing] from [other song]?" would make you answer yes?

      i think so

6.24.21  8:37 pm   how does one get motivation and inspiration to be creative?

      it's clear you already have both, or you would not be interested in asking this

6.24.21  8:29 pm   How your thoughts work ?

      MORE, THINK MORE,

6.24.21  7:10 pm   In the videos like Soap Tips and Hi, I'm Steve are the spoken portions of the video improvised or scripted before hand? A combo of both?

      the vocals are scripted

6.24.21  4:49 pm   why was the mysterious figure doing a party dance while sadness came closer in here comes the sun?

      for contrast, and juxtaposition

6.24.21  3:32 pm   Which came first, the chicken or the egg?

      i can't remember

6.24.21  2:11 pm   Do you enjoy naps?

      not on purpose

      it's what makes opinions possible

6.24.21  11:24 am   how many a in next s o n g 

      just enough

6.24.21  9:37 am   why do they birds fly in the business class section? who do they work for?

      this is to distract you from the more important question which is why are they flying on an airplane

6.24.21  7:26 am   How long does it take for you to write a song?

      200 years

6.24.21  3:31 am   who was the mysteryous figure doing a party dange while sadness came closer in here comes the sun?

      could be you, although in the video it was physically portrayed by me

6.24.21  1:51 am   When Electric Light Orchestra leader Jeff Lynne was asked weather or not the events of his album "TIME" had all been a dream, he claimed "This is what I'd like to know, because it's baffled me since I wrote it, if he has actually gone [to the future], or if he's just thinking about it. ... It could be real, or it could be a dream... I'm not sure. I'd rather not say, because I don't know either. I'm supposed to, but I don't." Have you stumbled into any of these lyrical occurrences, where you write something down that you do not understand yourself? What effect has it had on you and your ability to work on the piece?

      the best results in music are when it seems to mean more than you could ever realize. you always want to know you'll never run out of meaning. always good to know there's a surplus of meaning, to potentially get you through a drought. so it's a good sign when the lines seem to mean more than you can explain at first. that way the meaning can continue to unfold later
